description: The law as it relates to selected aspects of medicine and medical practice including medical negligence, medical battery, abortion, euthanasia, property rights in human body parts, competency determinations and product liability.
prerequisites: All Level 1 LAWS courses + LAWS2111 + LAWS2113
restricted: LLB(Hons)(#64), LLB(Hons)(#48), LLB (Graduate Entry), LLB(Hons) duals and LLB dual programs.
